danger_zone_description: Delete your account with all of your personal information and data
danger_zone_body: Delete your account with all personal data. This action cannot be undone!
delete_account_confirmation_body:
Before deleting your account, ensure you download any data you want to keep, and note that the following will occur:

  • Your content data will be permanently removed.
  • If you co-own an organization or team with other administrators, the ownership of that team will be transferred to another admin.
  • In the absence of fellow administrators or if you are the sole member of a team or organization, it will undergo an irreversible deletion along with all associated data.
  • Remember, this action cannot be undone; once it's executed, it's done for good.

Please enter {{email}} to confirm the deletion of your account.
